column3: Institute of Business, Industry and Leadership
column5: Note: This course will not run in September 2023. The next scheduled start date is September 2024. The focus of this programme is professional transformation which uses transformative learning principles to develop the skills and behaviours necessary to enable career progression at a senior organisational leadership level.COURSE OVERVIEWThis programme was co-created with industrial partners in the nuclear and engineering sector as a direct response to the skills they need from their future senior leaders.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
